duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide counseling and therapeutic support to clients, utilizing techniques such as EMDR, somatic therapy, art therapy, IFS, etc.
Empower women through coaching and support to improve self-esteem and relational well-being.
Manage a private practice, including caseload management and income generation.
Support the mission of the practice to promote healing, empowerment, and growth for women.
Participate in a tight-knit team of therapists and contribute to a healthy work-life balance culture.
Offer coaching and support to facilitate growth and development within the organization.
Transition clinicians into private practice by providing mentorship and guidance.
Support therapists in launching their own practices and career development.
Provide fully remote therapeutic services to clients located within Colorado.

education_certification.credential: Fully licensed LCSW or LPC in the state of Colorado.
Advanced training in EMDR, somatic therapy, art therapy, IFS, or related fields.
Experience in alternative types of therapy such as EMDR, IFS, somatic psychotherapy, art therapy, yoga therapy, feminine divine spirituality, etc.
Ability to manage caseload and income generation effectively.
Experience in transitioning from a clinical or agency setting to private practice.
Certification in coaching or related areas of personal development.
